Shortlist

23 Aug 2016

Shortlist

I cofounded Shortlist where I am the COO and Head of Product.

Top finance companies have (including 7 of the top 30 asset managers) used Shortlist to recruit outstanding individuals to their most senior roles. These roles would otherwise have gone to retained search.

The Shortlist platform achieved a number of industry firsts: - First to receive exclusivity on postings - First to recruit at the senior level (C-suite, SVP, etc.) - First vertical ‘curated’ network for senior level recruiting

FundFire, an industry leading publication for asset management, profiled us here.

You can find out more about Shortlist’s value to people who used it on the site, or you can learn more about the platform itself.
